title: CRIME DOES NOT PAY ARCHIVES (2012) (Dark Horse) (digital) (Son o
description:
Crime Does Not Pay Archives Volume 1 Hardcover

Uncut and uncensored, the infamous precode Crime Does Not Pay comics are finally collected into a series of archival hardcovers! With brutal, realistic tales focusing on vile criminals, Crime Does Not Pay was one of the most popular comics of the 1940s. The series was a favorite target of Dr. Fredric Wertham and other censors and is partially responsible for the creation of the stifling Comics Code Authority.

Now revered and mythic, this collection of the first four hard-to-find Crime Does Not Pay comics features a fine roster of Golden Age creators and a new introduction by Matt Fraction (Iron Man, Casanova)!

Genres: Crime, Classic
Publication Date: March 07, 2012
Full Color, 272 pages
Age range: 14+
